website_summaries.verdict: A stylish and affordable alternative to the traditional Adirondack design. Best for porches and covered decks.
pros: Sits low, but easier to dismount than others
cons: May arrive with parts missing or damaged
Lightweight, so sturdiness is an issue

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comfortable chair. Yes, it is low to the ground but I really like it. I plan to buy at least (1) more. I did have occasion to contact Best Choice Products and they were extremely kind and helpful. This is a good company; do not hesitate to buy. Husband says very easy assembly; no missing parts -- we will probably replace hardware with SS when it becomes necessary. Thank you Best Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Anne

customer_reviews.title: Chair Broke after minimal use . The Legs seem to be made of hallow aluminum (not sure)
customer_reviews.text: After minimum use, unexpectedly one of the front legs snapped. I contacted the supplier (with photos) expecting a resolution, as these chairs are not cheap. The supplier said they could not help as the product was beyond a 60 day warranty. I was expecting them to be surprised by the outcome and offer to exchange/replace the product. Maybe this condition is not so unusually. I had the chair less than a year. Sat in it 'maybe' 10 times. If you are expecting this to be outside and last several years, you might want to think twice. In my opinion it is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control in the metal construction.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not strong enough for 175 pound person. We bought two and one of them broke a year into owning. The brick support is after-market! It’s too bad the quality control of the welding department is pretty much non-existent. We returned one of the originals when we first bought it because one of the legs was as welded at an angle. There’s no bead on the weld - it’s basically like a tack weld to position the legs and they stopped there. Very disappointed - will need to repair these myself now with some make-shift screws and metal parts from Home Depot!
customer_reviews.author: Steven N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money and buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but assembly of these chairs was so awkward and difficult I decided to warn others that it is not worth purchasing these chairs. I bought 2 and I got the first one assembled after some frustration getting everything to line up. It would go a lot better if a second person was available to help. Second chair assembly was just a disaster. I think this one was sent back, repackaged and resold. Some of the screw holes were stripped so I could not get the screws in. Same problem with one of the arm assembly and also the chair backing. Save your time and frustration and just buy a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Riggall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfy but OMG the instructions....
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful chairs, a stylized version of the popular Adirondack chairs. They do sit low, but not lower than a standard Adirondack. They are very comfortable and are also stackable if you need to get them out of the way, The enclosed assembly directions are a disaster, I suggest you view the assembly video on the Amazon product page. For the price, they can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Yates

customer_reviews.title: Product isn’t intended for outdoor weather exposure – failed within 8 months with major rust damage
customer_reviews.text: Product isn't intended for outdoor weather exposure as claimed (Outdoor All Weather Proof) by the manufacturer. Do not buy this product. Amazon should remove the product from the market. All 4 chairs have various degrees of rust after only 8 months. The rust deterioration on two chairs resulted in the tubular supports in the arm rest and leg cracking. It was made of lowest possible grade of steel with the rapid deterioration. I suspect the product wasn't new as claimed and it was exposed to salt water environment (ocean shipping from China or improper storage). Amazon should request a refund from the manufacturer for extremely poor quality & misleading advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie

customer_reviews.title: First off these chairs look great and are comfy
customer_reviews.text: First off these chairs look great and are comfy, especially for the price . Now that I have had them for over a month I'm kind of disappointed with them and not sure if I should or can return them . The chairs are rusting and when I move them orange rust drips out , staining deck and patio. Also the seat cushions don't repel the water well therefore remain wet for long periods of time. Now I have to keep the cushions inside till I need them. If you live in an area that rains a lot these are not for you but if you want them for a sun room or dry area they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rlme

customer_reviews.title: Already broke from second use...Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs..I bought 2.. They look so good, but that is the end of it.. This is my second time to use it..and already broke... I noticed that is was corroded where it broke, even though they were kept in the garage...VERY VERY CHEAP quality...I wish I can return them..
customer_reviews.author: Aboualex

customer_reviews.title: A Good Quality, Comfortable and Stylish, Patio Chair
customer_reviews.text: The product looks exactly like the photo. It has a very clean build and lines. You have to assemble it, there are 8 bolts, that screw into the metal frame on which the chair is built. Build quality is very good, and being based on the Adirondack design, it is very comfortable. The cats in my neighborhood are fighting over it already, 2 days in. The product arrived within 3 days
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Chair is very comfortable but also very low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair to keep out by the firepit. Chair is very comfortable but also very low to the ground. My only issue is discovering rusty puddles under them after the first good rain. Hoping it doesn't keep doing this.
customer_reviews.author: righter86

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two - one was rusted out.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not bad. The screw where the arm attaches to the backing was rusted out and we cannot screw the screw in. Not sure its worth the hassle since it doesnt affect the structural soundness of the chair. The cushions are darker in person than the photo and we recommend a 20x20 pillow to make sitting in them comfortable if you are using them for a balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sturdy Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review two years after purchase. They have held up and still look brand new. We have left them outdoors this entire time. They are very nice looking chairs and really add to curb appeal !
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Madhatter

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but construction issues
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of chairs that we purchased. The first set has lasted for over three years without breaking. The second set of one of the chairs broke within three months of purchase. One of the legs sheared off from the frame. I tried to get a refund, return, or replacement but never heard from the manufacturer. Amazon ended up having to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! Quality is terrible. I purchased 4 and received one damaged. Plastic webbing was unwound on one leg so I returned it and the replacement had the same issue. I returned that one and received a good one. Now 2 months later the webbing is breaking at the seat. Goto Costco and buy better quality chairs cheaper. Very disappointed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.

customer_reviews.title: stylish...
customer_reviews.text: very european look/style... you can see how they tie the cuhsion around the wicker... its a beautiful chair... sits low to the ground which i love too...
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy.....
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking chairs. Does not take long to put them together. Be advised the directions are off a bit(In ref to the washers). But once you put 1 together the next one's go so much quicker...
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: What Junk... Spend the extra $50 and ...
customer_reviews.text: What Junk... Spend the extra $50 and get the wooden chairs... These would blow away in a strong wind... Extremely uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but very light and they fly with any wind.
customer_reviews.author: AdamT

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look great - very modern and stylish! Not the easiest to assemble because 1) some of the chair weaving covers the holes, and 2) some of the holes don’t line up that easily... but we (two of us) got them together and are very happy with how they look. We bought 4 of them to go around our fire pit, and will be buying 4 more for the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but that was even easy, the price was good
customer_reviews.text: ok this was way worth it.. very stylish, very low seating for relax mode, but had to put together, but that was even easy, the price was good...
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks very nice and is comfortable to set in. I am going to order a second one in the near future. Oh, And the package came before the promise date.
customer_reviews.author: cannatc

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: It looks lovely on my porch, I find myself falling asleep sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look and sit great, a little low for some maybe but I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rjh

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. Had to get another sent due to missing and mismatched parts. Good customer service and quick response to issue. Used both to make one good one. Lightweight. Nice styling. They are low to the ground and we use them around ground fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Curley888

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice for the price however 2 of the 4 did ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these chairs. They are very nice for the price however 2 of the 4 did not come with hardware. I have been on hold with the manufacturer for 30 minutes so far. If you get one with hardware I'm certain you will like it
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy chairs...low to ground like an Adirondack chair. Greta by the pool for relaxing days!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A. Lucchesi

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They look great around our fire pit. They sit low so perfect. Love them. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Need a little help. Need to replace cushions can anyone let me know how and if the have the manufacture phone number would help! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a bit of a pain but nothing too hard. They are very comfortable I bought six to use around my fire pit. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience ever!!! Don’t buy anything from Best choice products
customer_reviews.text: If I can give you 0 star I will Worst experience Ever! Defective item and they charged for restocking wft!!! No my fault you sell trash $50 Less then what I pay ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CHAIRS FOR THE PRICE. WENT TOGETHER EASILY AND HAS OFFERED MANY POOL PARTY HOURS.
customer_reviews.author: Ronninonni

customer_reviews.title: Chill
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! We love these chairs. Awkward lean but when you sit in the chair it works! Most comfortable we have!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Moret

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 230lbs, and this chair doesn't even so much as bend when I sit down on it. It does sit pretty low to the ground, more than I expected. So just be aware when purchasing. Other than that I love it, as does my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped with missing parts and stripped holes making it impossible to assemble. Box was in bad shape so I cannot use it to return the product!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Twine was undone on leg when I opened the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Twine was undone on leg when I opened the box. I tried to fix it but there was no way to. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: granadoz

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs for our deck
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs for our deck. Comfortable and stylish. They sit low, which I like. Better with a thin pillow for your back.
customer_reviews.author: Annin P

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these chairs (bought 2) and we've already entertained a number of folks who say the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair!! Super easy to put together. Took maybe 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: 3lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair that seems to be built well
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair that seems to be built well. Not really Adirondack, it's low to the ground but the seat is horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: KPanik

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with the quality of this product not very well made and parts are horribly made all together.
customer_reviews.author: Seo Experts OC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, classy looking chairs for the pool patio! Would love another set! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wicker chair
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of patio furniture. Very easy to put together - took 15 minutes. Comfy. Compared many chairs before settling on this one. Much classier than most and at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Ljane

customer_reviews.title: They look great. They're low
customer_reviews.text: They look great. They're low! But the quality issue is that the metal on the arm and some screws have rusted already and we've only had them out for a couple of monthes
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs, the only thing is, that they are very low. If you have a hard time getting up from a low chair or sofa these may not be the chairs for you. I'm 64 and some times it's a little hard to get up out of the chair. Once you sit down with a lumbar pillow you wont want to get up.
customer_reviews.author: deloris dumas-franks

customer_reviews.title: good looking and pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, good looking and pretty durable. We've owned four of them for a year, and they've held up well. Be careful with the plastic "wicker", if cut, it's a bit tricky to repair.
customer_reviews.author: The Rick

customer_reviews.title: The chairs were nice but basically and inch from the ground
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 of these chairs and I am trying to return them. I am now being told I will have to pay for the return. The chairs were nice but basically and inch from the ground. I may as well sit on the ground. Also, I was never told I could not return for free. Nowhere in the description does it say that or I would have never ordered something I cannot return. I have amazon prime and have never had this problem before. please make this right and send me 4 return labels so I can return them to you. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE DYBAS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Ordered only one to try it out, but we will be ordering more. Very sturdy and handsome chair! Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: EGS

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this chair. We ordered two. Considering ordering more. Lightweight chairs - may wait to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs. Very easy to put together. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Robin T

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cake assembly and great looking chair
customer_reviews.text: Piece of cake assembly and great looking chair. Cushion's plushy and comfortable. The seat is huge and I guarantee it can accommodate even super fat people. The wicker is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Goo, Y.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted and at an agreeable price too
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Great price * Good quality * Easy to assemble (includes all hardware and a allen key too) * Light * Confortable Con: * When no one is sitting, only 3 feet touch - just looks funny
customer_reviews.author: J. Couture

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products All-Weather Wicker Adirondack Chair for Backyard, Patio, Porch, Deck - Beige
product_meta.description: Best Choice Products presents you this brand new Wicker Adirondack chair. Relax on the patio with this all-weather Wicker Adirondack Chair. Assembly is easy and it will add a stylish touch to any backyard. We purchase our products directly from the manufacturer, so you know you're getting the best prices available. NEW PRODUCT WITH FACTORY PACKAGING (not used or refurbished). FEATURES: Stylish and comfortable for backyard lounging. Smooth and soft sun resistance wicker sofa in heavy duty steel frame. Washable, removable, fade-resistant cushions. Smooth and soft sun resistance wicker. Easy to clean with damp cloth. Environmental friendly and 100 percent recyclable. SPECIFICATIONS: Product dimension: 33" (L) X26 " (W) X33"(H). Backrest:19"(W) X28"(L). Seat:20"(W) X20"(L). Product weight: 26.33lbs. Weight capacity:250 lbs. Color: Dark brown with beige cushion. PLEASE NOTE: Our digital images are as accurate as possible. However, different monitors may cause colors to vary slightly. Some of our items are handcrafted and/or hand finished. Color can vary and slight imperfections in the metal work are normal and considered evidence of the hand-finishing process, which adds character and authenticity to those items.
feature_bullets: Adirondack chair is built with a tall, curved backrest design to promote a stylish and comfortable lounging experience
Crafted of smooth, sun-resistant wicker with a heavy-duty steel frame, this outdoor furniture piece will be a mainstay in any setting
Chair includes a thick, fade-resistant cushion with removeable and machine-washable cover, allowing for easy maintenance
Ideal for placement on the porch, patio, or by the pool, this lounger gives a variety of options for outdoor decor
Overall Dimensions: 33"(L) x 26"(W) x 33"(H); Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars86 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
